project.name: hxcpp
project.description: Hxcpp is the c++ backend compiler for haxe. This release constains the compiler, libries and support code required to generate a fully compiled exe from haxe code. Eventually, much of this will be merged into the main code branch.
project.version: Initial haxelib release. Added Mac(intel) and Linux ports. Updated to 2.0.3 code base.
